nodes.bodyText:

            FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts one yearl
          
          
            
            FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts one year
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,6 +7,22 @@ DistributedShares.text="%s have been distributed as shares." NotImplemented.text="You cannot afford to pay %s! Lucky for you that personnel morale is not yet implemented." AssetPayment.text="Your account has been credited for %s from %s " +## Finances Enums +# FinancialYearDuration Enum +FinancialYearDuration.SEMIANNUAL.text=Semiannual +FinancialYearDuration.SEMIANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts six months +FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.text=Annual +FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts one yearl

nodes.bodyText: Do we really want to give this option? Some people run units from the Star League to the Succession Wars.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -7,6 +7,22 @@ DistributedShares.text="%s have been distributed as shares." NotImplemented.text="You cannot afford to pay %s! Lucky for you that personnel morale is not yet implemented." AssetPayment.text="Your account has been credited for %s from %s " +## Finances Enums +# FinancialYearDuration Enum +FinancialYearDuration.SEMIANNUAL.text=Semiannual +FinancialYearDuration.SEMIANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts six months +FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.text=Annual +FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts one yearl +FinancialYearDuration.BIANNUAL.text=Biannual +FinancialYearDuration.BIANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts two years +FinancialYearDuration.QUINQUENNIAL.text=Quinquennial +FinancialYearDuration.QUINQUENNIAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts five years +FinancialYearDuration.DECENNIAL.text=Decennial +FinancialYearDuration.DECENNIAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts ten years +FinancialYearDuration.FOREVER.text=Forever +FinancialYearDuration.FOREVER.toolTipText=The financial year lasts forever

nodes.bodyText: I added a bit more saying it was not recommended in the name itself, but I did add that based on a direct request for it.
